title: Ex-Goldman Sachs Law Chief Aiding Dan Snyder (Podcast)
itunes:title: Ex-Goldman Sachs Law Chief Aiding Dan Snyder (Podcast)
description:
Bloomberg's Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu, along with guest host Damian Sassower talk with Bloomberg Law's Justin Wise about the latest developments in Dan Snyder's battle to keep ownership of the NFL's Washington Commanders amid a series of scandals, including recruiting help from an ex-Goldman Sach law chief.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
